name: Michael Howell From Capital Wars
title: Global Liquidity Watch Weekly Update
text:
Synopsis
Global liquidity conditions are stabilizing, with four key positive factors supporting potential market recovery, though caution is advised as risk assets may have prematurely anticipated improvements.

Key Insights
- Central Bank liquidity has recovered from its early January dip
- Collateral values (bond markets) are improving
- US dollar is losing momentum
- Bond market volatility is decreasing
- Risk assets, gold, and cryptocurrencies experienced a momentum loss since October 2024
- Recent short-term recovery in gold and risk assets may be premature
- Additional liquidity is still required for sustained market improvement
